singlePong

Class SinglePong

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.AbstractComponent
      • core.AbstractProblem
        • core.AbstractSingleProblem
          • singlePong.SinglePong

  • public class SinglePong
extends AbstractSingleProblem
    Represents single player tennis game, which belongs to arcade genre. More information about this game http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pong
    Author:
    Sergii Zhevzhyk

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateCandidate

        protected double evaluateCandidate(AbstractRepresentation candidate)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSingleProblem
        Evaluates the given representation by calculating its corresponding fitness value. A higher fitness means better performance.
        Specified by:
        evaluateCandidate in class AbstractSingleProblem
        Parameters:
        candidate - The candidate solution to be evaluated.
        Returns:
        the corresponding fitness value.

      • replayWithVisualization

        public void replayWithVisualization(AbstractRepresentation candidate)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSingleProblem
        This function is called when the user request a visual replay from the problem. A total re-evaluation is not needed, only to provide a visual mean for the user to grasp the performance of the indicated candidate solution.

        It is recommended to use advanced threading for display like SwingWorker.

        Overrides:
        replayWithVisualization in class AbstractSingleProblem
        Parameters:
        candidate - The candidate whose replay has been requested.

      • getMaximumFitness

        public double getMaximumFitness()
        Description copied from class: AbstractSingleProblem
        Returns the achievable maximum fitness of this problem. A representations with this fitness value cannot be improved any further.
        Specified by:
        getMaximumFitness in class AbstractSingleProblem

      • adjustRequirements

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,XMLFieldEntry> adjustRequirements(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,XMLFieldEntry> requirements,
                                                                              java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,XMLFieldEntry> properties)
        Description copied from class: AbstractProblem
        Adjusts and returns the requirements of this problem that is modified according to the properties. Override this method if the requirements are dependent on the properties of this problem.
        Overrides:
        adjustRequirements in class AbstractProblem
        Parameters:
        requirements - The set of requirement keys and values read from the source XML file.
        properties - The set of property keys and values.
        Returns:
        the new requirement set adjust according to the given set of parameters.
